results.title: Gallic acid and metformin co-administration reduce oxidative stress, apoptosis and inflammation via Fas/caspase-3 and NF-kappaB signaling pathways in thioacetamide-induced acute hepatic encephalopathy in rats
results.text_hl: This study evaluates the combined effect of @CHEMICAL_Gallic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005707 @@@gallic acid@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Gallic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005707 @@@GA@@@), and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@GENE_MET @GENE_24553 @@@Met@@@) on the @DISEASE_Chemical_and_Drug_Induced_Liver_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D056486 @@@liver and brain damage@@@ associated with @<m>DISEASE_Hepatic_Encephalopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006501 @@@HE@@@.

results.title: Metformin Impairs Glutamine Metabolism and Autophagy in Tumour Cells
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ has been shown to inhibit @GENE_GLS @GENE_2744 @@@glutaminase@@@ (@GENE_GLS @GENE_2744 @@@GLS@@@) activity and @CHEMICAL_Ammonia @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000641 @@@ammonia@@@ accumulation thereby reducing the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Hepatic_Encephalopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006501 @@@hepatic encephalopathy@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: Successful management of a type 2 diabetic donor in living-donor liver transplantation: a case report.
results.text_hl: She stopped using @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ and returned to @CHEMICAL_Nateglinide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077715 @@@nateglinide@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin hydrochloride@@@ on postoperative day 25.
